title: Transdermal for All-Seasons Plus Wig Adhesive: Secure, Seamless Looking & Gentle Hair Replacement Glue for Lace and Poly Hairpieces, 1.3oz
body_html:
Transdermal All-Season Plus Wig Adhesive is your go-to for a reliable wig bond that lasts through any activity and weather. Specially made for both lace and polyurethane hair units, this adhesive gives you a strong, invisible hold, keeping your style looking flawless and natural.

Crafted with care in Ireland, our glue is free from harsh stuff like latex, ensuring it’s gentle on your skin and safe for every scalp. Its easy application and removal process make it a breeze to use, fitting perfectly into your daily routine. Plus, with its clear, matte finish, you'll never have to worry about anyone noticing your wig line.

Whether you're dealing with a hot, sunny day or a sudden gust of wind, Transdermal All-Season Plus has got your back. Its waterproof and sweat-resistant formula means your hairpiece stays put, letting you enjoy life without wig worries. Choose Transdermal All-Season Plus Wig Adhesive for a secure, comfortable, and invisible wig-wearing experience.

  • STRONG HOLD FOR ALL WEATHER - Keep your wig secure, no matter the weather! Our Transdermal All-Season Plus Wig Adhesive is made to last through sunny days, windy walks, and everything in between. Made in Ireland, our glue is perfect for lace and polyurethane hair units and it keeps your look in place without worry.
  • EASY TO USE - Use our glue without hassle. It's simple to apply and just as easy to take off, making your routine smoother. Plus, it's safe for every kind of wig cap, ensuring a comfy fit every time.
  • SAFE FOR EVERYONE - Our wig glue is made with safe, water-based stuff that's free from bad chemicals. This means it's gentle on your skin and scalp, so you can wear your wig comfortably all day.
  • NO SHINE, ALL INVISIBLE - Our adhesive dries to a clear, matte look that doesn't shine, making sure no one spots where your wig begins. It's like magic, keeping your hairline hidden and your style looking natural.
  • STAY SECURE, FEEL CONFIDENT - With our Transdermal All-Season Plus, say goodbye to worries about your wig moving or falling. It's tough against sweat and the elements, so you can go about your day with confidence.

Brand Professional Hair Labs
Specific Uses For Product Wig, Lace, High Temperature Environments, Waterproof Conditions
Material acrylic
Compatible Material Acrylic, Polyurethane, Lace
Item Form Liquid
